thread.title: New York Times Digital Subscriptions Drives Revenue Gains

author: Lukas I. Alpert
title: New York Times Digital Subscriptions Drives Revenue Gains

organizations.name: new york times digital subscriptions drives revenue gains new york times co.

text:
New York Times Co. reported solid revenue growth for the fourth quarter, driven primarily by digital subscriptions as a sizable one-time pension settlement charge weighed on net income.
The companyâ€™s revenue increased 10.1% to $484.1 million in the quarter. Subscription revenue jumped 19.2% to $269.4 million as the paper added 99,000 digital news subscribers and 58,000 subscribers to its crossword and cooking apps.
